prompt.0: Imagine you are a professional translator with years of experience. Your specialty is to translate texts from German to English precisely while maintaining the original tone. Your task is to translate the following German text into English without asking any questions or providing further explanations. Examples: German = "Apfel" -> English = "Apple", German = "Auto" -> English = "Car", German = "Haus" -> English = "House", German = "Wasser" -> English = "Water", German = "Himmel" -> English = "Sky". Here is the text: "Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben."

source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
**English translation:**

The roughly 1,400 staff members who were deployed have fixed six suspicious pouches at the beginning of the Carnival and have now determined, due to multiple cases of physical abuse and sexual misconduct, that precise numbers about the crime rate will be revealed in the next week.

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
